German[edit]

Alternative forms[edit]

  • männl., m. (abbreviations)

Etymology[edit]

From Middle High German manlich, from Old High German manlīh, manalīh. Mann +‎ -lich

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈmɛnlɪç/
  • audio
    		(file)

Adjective[edit]

männlich (comparative männlicher, superlative am männlichsten)

  1. male
  2. manly
  3. (grammar, not comparable) masculine

Antonyms[edit]

  • (male): weiblich
  • (grammar): weiblich, sächlich

Derived terms[edit]

  • Männlichkeit
  • vermännlichen

Related terms[edit]

  • Mann
  • Männchen
  • Männlein
